administrativeState.description: administrativeState of the network interface. Example: up | down.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

connectedTo.description: The arm resource id of the interface or compute server its connected to.

networkDeviceRole.description: networkDeviceRole is the device role: Example: CE | ToR.

deviceName.description: deviceName will be used for setting the hostName of the device.

serialNumber.description: serialNumber of the format Make;Model;HardwareRevisionId;SerialNumber. Example: Arista;DCS-7280DR3-24;12.05;JPE21116969

tags.description: Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.

allOf.description: Common patchable properties for Network Device.

version.description: Current version of the device as defined in SKU.

provisioningState.description: Gets the provisioning state of the resource.

networkRackId.description: Reference to network rack resource id.

allOf.description: The resource model definition for an Azure Resource Manager proxy resource, except required location and tags.

nextLink.description: Url to follow for getting next page of resources.
Url to follow for getting next page of resources.

skuVersion.description: The supported version defined in network device SKU.

powerCycleState.description: On or Off power cycle state.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of the device

connectorType.description: The physical cable connector type. Example: Optical

connectedTo.description: Connected to ARM resource or external interface
